title: Little Milly and the Great Lakes: Peg and the Party Line
description: Kelly knew Little Milly Lake as Grandma Mill McInenly. The usually serious Mildred would occasionally surprise her granddaughter with tales of the fun and mischief that she and her five older sisters found growing up in the Maritimes in the early 1900s. The combination of little money or supervision, and a notoriously grumpy father, made for simple stories with just the right blend of silly and sweet.Little Milly and the Great Lakes is Kelly's first creative writing endeavor... she has been distracted by Little Mateo and Little Lucas.Get silly with Millyon her other adventures...Bess and the Boil, Marj and the Medal, Ene and the Ivy,Flo and the Fishermen & Milly and the Mail
author: Kelly McInenly
